com.mschwartz.dateslider.labeler

Class DayWeekdayLabeler

  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MonthDayWeekdayLabeler

    public class DayWeekdayLabeler
extends DayLabeler
    A Labeler that displays days using DayWeekdayLayoutView.

      • DayWeekdayLabeler

        public DayWeekdayLabeler(java.lang.String formatString,
                         TimeBoundaries timeBoundaries)
        The format string that specifies how to display the day. Since this class uses a DayTimeLayoutView, the format string should consist of two strings separated by a space.
